cast.overview: A young sex worker from Brooklyn gets her chance at a Cinderella story when she meets and impulsively marries the son of an oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairytale is threatened as his parents set out to get the marriage annulled.
cast.title: Anora

also_known_as: マルク・エイデルシュテイン
details.biography: Mark Alexandrovich Eydelshteyn (born February 18, 2002) is a Russian actor. He gained fame after playing the leading role in the drama The Land of Sasha (2022). He is most prominently recognized for his role as Ivan "Vanya" Zakharov in Anora (2024), directed by Sean Baker.
details.name: Mark Eydelshteyn
